fullText: This Broadway adaptation of the acclaimed 2007 indie film preserves the intimate, bittersweet spirit of the original while adding theatrical magic that feels organic rather than forced.
dtliExcerpt: This Broadway adaptation of the acclaimed 2007 indie film preserves the intimate, bittersweet spirit of the original while adding theatrical magic that feels organic rather than forced.
